ReportSection.title: Incrementation - Recommendation of ≥ 1.0
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Based on my review of your performance, your annual report and our meeting to discuss my review on {getText({$report_type}, TABLE, FOLLOWUP_DATE, {$user_id}, 1, 0)}, I am writing to advise you that I will be making a recommendation to the Faculty Evaluation Committee (FEC) for incrementation of {getText(RP_CHAIR, FEC_REVIEW, INCREMENT, {$user_id}, 0, 0)}.

As per the requirements of Article A6 14.1 of Schedule A, please accept this as notification that the Faculty Evaluation Committee meetings will be held December 2 - December 6. Shortly after the completion of this meeting, you will be notified of the FEC’s incrementation award

Thank you for your contributions to the University and I wish you great success during the coming year.
